A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Great movie. I love the risks that Star Wars and Rian Johnson takes in the film. There were a few parts of the storyline that were slow and could have been done better. I thought the whole relationship with Finn and Rose was forced and would have liked to see more Rey and Finn. I absolutely loved Rey and Kylo's chemistry in this one though! And the new places they explored with the force were all awesome.
